docs.abstract: Prosecutors did not receive information about an 11-month-old sexual assault allegation involving Florida State quarterback Jameis Winston until mid-November; Tallahassee police, citing continuing investigation, have not said much about case, including why investigators waited so long to hand over information to local prosecutors.
